abstract.text: Obtain accessory information and control tracking behavior.

inlineContent.text: provides information about the dock accessory including its model name and firmware version. It also controls the dock accessory when you disable system tracking. Use

to  perform animations, or explicitly control the position of the dock accessory in three-dimensional space by supplying coordinates in units of radians.  The collection of the X, Y, and Z values corresponding to pitch, yaw, and roll is the
If there are multiple subjects in a video frame, direct the dock accessory to focus on a particular area of the frame using
exception if you animate or set the orientation of the dock accessory too quickly, so keep call rates at 2 times per second or less.

abstract.text: A type that can be hashed into a `Hasher` to produce an integer hash value.
